page.title: 12Parish Council.Middleton
page.content: Middleton and North Runcton have Parish Councils which provide things like bus shelters,cutting of the village green(North Runcton), and upkeep of the playing field and churchyard(Middleton). There are nine parish councillors at Middleton and six at North Runcton. They are local people,{elected}every four years and unpaid. Each Parish Council meets every month. Parish Councils raise money by{local {rates}and also sometimes receive grants from District and County Councils. An important part of their work is concerned with getting District and County Councils to improve their services to the village The Parish Councillors we spoke to said that they liked serving the village but that few people are willing to become councillors.
